    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83481</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83481</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Equal forces on dumb-bell being held still</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleiche Kräfte auf der Stummglocke, die noch 
angehalten wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces égales sur la sourd--cloche étant tenue 
toujours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças iguais no dumb-sino que está sendo 
prendido ainda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze uguali sulla dumb-flangia che è tenuta 
ancora</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ίσες δυνάμεις στον αλτήρα που κρατιέται ακόμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas iguales en la mudo-alarma todavía que es
sostenida</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that two equal forces act on the dumb-bell, the upward force of arm muscles and the weight of the dumb-bell that pulls downwards.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">arm muscles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dumb-bells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equal forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß zwei gleiche Kräfte 
auf der Stummglocke, der aufwärts Kraft der Armmuskeln und dem 
Gewicht der Stummglocke fungieren, die abwärts zieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que deux forces égales 
agissent sur la sourd--cloche, la force ascendante des muscles de bras
et le poids de la sourd--cloche qui tire en bas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que duas forças iguais 
agem no dumb-sino, na força ascendente dos músculos do braço e no 
peso do dumb-sino que puxa para baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che due forze uguali 
si comportano sulla dumb-flangia, sulla forza ascendente dei muscoli 
del braccio e sul peso della dumb-flangia che tira verso il basso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι δύο ίσες δυνάμεις 
ενεργούν στον αλτήρα, τους ανοδικούς μυς δύναμης του βραχίονα και
το βάρος του αλτήρα που τραβά προς τα κάτω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que dos fuerzas iguales
actúan en la mudo-alarma, la fuerza ascendente de los músculos del 
brazo y el peso de la mudo-alarma que tira hacia abajo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Armmuskeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gleiche Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
